ygData.subject: RE: Newbie bard race to 12
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Woohoo!  Thanks. ... Unrest eh?  Never been there.  I ll check it out though. My big question now is what songs to use when.  I discovered at 11 I could
ygData.messageBody:
Tsengu/Tszaaz wrote:

> In fact *puts on Arcane Cap of Linear Time
> Perception* it
> was about, oh, 11pm EST, so you win! :o)

Woohoo! Thanks.

> I took a peek at the Lake of Ill Omen
> and decided my
> time is probaly now best spent elsewhere, so, off to Unrest!

Unrest eh? Never been there. I'll check it out though.

My big question now is what songs to use when. I discovered at 11 I could
solo better twisting only hymn & warsong w/o instruments as opposed to
hymn/warsong/CoD w/o instruments (weapons beat instruments hands down at
11). This is probably due to dropping songs while twisting 3 in less than
perfect conditions. Knowing this I've got to really focus on the two most
effective songs and what to throw in as a third if possible.

My big plan for 12 while soloing is still hymn & warsong. I'm guessing
Bellow beats CoD (especially with weapons) so I'll through that in as a
third song. Or should I focus more on offense and sing warsong & bellow and
occasionally hymn?

Grouping really depends on the group & whether we're likely to be fighting
singles or multiples. But here's what I did at 11. Any suggestions for 12?

Hymn - during battle if no healer, between battles irregardless
CoB - if caster heavy group and I'm not tanking
warsong - if caster heavy group and I am tanking
anthem - melee heavy group
CoD - in battle & with hymn if additional mobs show up and start picking on
a caster, or when pulling to get a mobs attention faster, or in battle if
I've switched to my lute to heal someone
Jig - between battles when you get a caster that swears it's affecting mana
and you're too tired to argue. Usually I've got Lament in that spot anyway.
I rarely use either.
E Rhythms - in place of CoB in caster heavy groups where I'm not tanking, in
place of hymn otherwise. CoB/Hymn would still be that third song I'd try to
fit in if possible.

So now where should Bellow be used? And do you see anything drastically
wrong with what I've been doing?

Peace
Evulia, twink of twelve tunes, Tunare
